## MSG_DEFEAT_QUOTE_SETH_ONEILL
[OpenMidLeft][LoadFace_ONeill]
No... I don't want... to die.[A][N][ToggleSmile]
But at least, I can say it took[N]
the Silver Knight... to best me.[A][X]

## MSG_DEFEAT_QUOTE_BREGUET

the continent.[A][X]
